attributes.action: Close schools,colleges and universities until cases are low-online school work
attributes.additional_details: It’s unfair for the older generation to be blaming gen-z for the rise of cases covid 19,when you are forcing us to be in education,where there is a lack of social distancing and mask wearing,where teachers aren’t reinforcing gov guidelines.
attributes.background:
I want the GOV to close all education places and get people to work from home-the cases are rising because you are making us go to school/college.
You are also blaming the younger generation for the cause of higher cases

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
